channel.title: Vuejs on Andy Bulka
channel.description: Recent content in Vuejs on Andy Bulka

item.title: GUI Showdown
item.description: Andy’s GUI Showdown - The same application, implemented in various ways - which is better, cleaner, more understandable etc? Like the TodoMVC “Rosetta Stone” project, but uses a different example application, and includes Python as well as Javascript implementations. This project was originally intended to see if an ECS (Entity Component System), which is commonly used in building games, could be used to implement a “normal” GUI application. Five Javascript implementations: Live Demo of all Javascript implementations.
